attributes.additional_details:
The year is 2011 and in 4 years time we shall arrive in the period Doc Brown and Marty McFly say we should be using hoverboards.

 Now over the years many companies have looked at the idea of hoverboards but nobody has ever gone through with it. I therefore challenge the government to make this idea real and have 4years in which to do so.

By doing so it would reduce congestion on our roads and get more people out into fresh air and add great value to our economy.
